page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {Nightlife in Clydebank} There are two main nightclubs in Clydebank which both have a bar and disco. This is for over 18's. {Daytime entertainment in Clydebank} Clydebank has a wide range of leisure facilities for all ages during the day. There are three main Community Education Centres which cater for everyone. All provide playgroups, Registered Youth Organisations,cafes and a large variety of clubs. {A large majority of Clydebank citizens think the entertainment is far from satisfactory therefore they go elsewhere for their leisure. Most people enjoy parties,sport and discos. Clydebank does not have a cinema or a concert hall for youths to see their pop idols. To summerise this Clydebank does not supply enough entertainment for everybody to enjoy.
